title: I hereby declare that I am the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Supervisor employed for the proposed work and that the statements made in this form are true and correct to the best of my knowledge
clause_text: I hereby declare that I am the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Supervisor employed for the proposed work and that the statements made in this form are true and correct to the best of my knowledge. Architect / Licensed Engineer / Supervisor employed.
